text:
+Hs00129 
PM64, TTYD and SPM are really good, despite the gameplay change for SPM, all 3 had tons of awesome OCs, it had great stories that doesnt only concern Peach being kidnapped, which is rare for a Mario game.

PMSS tho...gameplay was okay but the lack of OCs or great story made the game really bad compared to the others.

text: It is better than the first one. The original had no story whatsoever (and people are complainting about Sticker Star having Bowser as the main villain...)

text: Yeah? Well the first two didn't have any plot! If you look at it that way, even TTYD was like:" Hey, rescue the princess from the evil dude" Without SPM, you wouldn't have great characters like dimentio, count bleck, mr. L! I still think TTYD is the best, but SPM is better than the original
author: Jony FiftyFour

text: It's video game racism!
author: Jony FiftyFour

text: SS had no story, but the original had pretty much the same thing! I mean sure, the chapters themselves are written a lot better than Sticker Star, but the main plot is still: "Bowser kidnapped Peach, go save her and collect some magical items on your way!
